segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, and the woman is just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching so high for the cookies, and that stool is not stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, like she doesn’t see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside, it’s a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, like nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the cabinets, and she doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is just going to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty, and they’re still sneaking more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just waiting for something bad to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
